name: hideElement
content:
## hideElement(id)

Hides the element with the provided id so it is not shown on the screen.

The user interface elements you place on the screen are not static. Your app sometimes needs to move, resize, hide or show them. All UI elements (button(), textInput(), textLabel(), dropDown(), checkBox(), radioButton(), image()), can be hidden.


[bug]

Found a bug in the documentation? Let us know at documentation@code.org

[/bug]

examples.name: Blinking

palette_params.name: id
palette_params.description: The ID of the UI element to which this event handler applies. Must begin with a letter, contain no spaces, and may contain letters, digits, - and _.

return_value: No return value. Modifies display only.
short_description:
